Dating: LATE PERIOD (not before); PTOLEMAIC PERIOD (not after)
Name: Jackals
Description: Cartonnage. The jackal on the shrine is accompanied by short descriptive texts. The upper line is the same for both parts: "May he (Anubis) give that the Ba lives and your body be whole". Underneath, on the left, is "Anubis, the foremost of the divine hall, may he give a beautiful funeral", and on the right: "Anubis, who is in the place of embalming, the Lord of the necropolis".
